title: Geode
summaries: The Geode is a rare consumable dropped by Granite-themed enemies with a 5*1/20 (5%) chance. Geodes can be thrown with the ⚒ Use / Attack button, causing them to drop two types of gems upon impact with blocks. The amount of gems varies from 3 to 6.

statistics.Tooltip: May drop valuable shinies when smashed!
statistics.Sell: 5
